passingUserIDs.description: An array of UserIDs that will be forced to pass the gate.

failingUserIDs.description: An array of UserIDs that will be forced to fail the gate.

passingCustomIDs.description: An array of CustomIDs that will be forced to pass the gate (used for gates not using UserID as their idType).

failingCustomIDs.description: An array of CustomIDs that will be forced to fail the gate (used for gates not using UserID as their idType).

environment.description: Which environment(s) the override is to be applied, Null implies all environments.

unitID.description: Which unit ID the override is being applied to.

passingIDs.description: IDs that are forced to pass the feature gate

failingIDs.description: IDs that are forced to fail the feature gate

name.description: The display name to give the new gate

creatorID.description: The userID of intended creator, defaults to Console API
